page.title: 20ARTY CRAFTY TEVIOTHEAD
page.content: WOMEN IN THE TEVIOTHEAD AND NEWMILL RURAL INSTITUTE PARTICIPATING IN THE 1985 ROXBURGHSHIRE FEDERATION SHOW ARE EXHIBITING WORKS THEY MADE WHICH HAVE INVOLVED{APPLIQUE, WEAVING, KNITTING, {RAG-RUG MAKING, DRESS-MAKING}AND {EMBROIDERY.}SEWING{SOMETHING NEW FROM {SOMETHING OLD}IS DONE BY ANOTHER W.R.I. MEMBER. YET ANOTHER TURNS HER HAND BEAUTIFULLY TO{FLOWER ARRANGING. { BUTTER}IS PRODUCED BY ONE FARMER'S WIFE WHO BECAME IRRITATED BY THE FREQUENCY SOUR MILK WAS DELIVERED, SO SHE BOUGHT A COW AND HAS REVIVED THE CRAFT OF BUTTER-MAKING USING THE SURPLUS MILK. THANKS TO THE DOMESDAY PROJECT THREE MEMBERS OF THE LOCAL W.R.I. HAVE BEEN INTRODUCED TO THE ART OF{COMPUTING.} THANKS TO THESE THREE PEOPLE YOU HAVE THESE PAGES TO REFER TO.
